ProjectTitle: Structure-based design of inhibitors targeting the chromatin-reading function of LEDGF/p75 to treat acute mixed-lineage leukemia
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/06/2023
We still have not received your DMP according to your funders requirements. 
You can find the FWO DMP template in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website where you can also find more information about the FWO RDM requirements: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan. Please consult our website for more information on how to write a DMP: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp. 
Please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be if you need assistance writing your DMP

08/07/2022
You now submitted the data management information that is asked for in the proposal. At this stage of the project FWO asks a more elaborate data management plan. To write this you can use DMPonline KU Leuven (https://dmponline.kuleuven.be/), selecting the FWO template, here you can also find guidance. Alternatively, you can use the word template that you can find on the FWO website (www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/). You can find more information on our RDM website: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
label: good with suggestions
